workExp.place: Xi'an YTO Information Technology Co., Ltd
workExp.detail: Engaged in Java development, using springboot for REST API development, and developed customer service management systems and express supply chain systems for the logistics industry

Develop customer service system on operator BG, analyze user usage data for statistical reports and large screen displays, and provide real-time support to customer service personnel through intelligent fault analysis

comments.name: Thomas
comments.comment: He is conscientious and responsible in his work. He is able to assist colleagues in responding to and handling existing network issues in a timely manner on the basis of completing the assigned development tasks, ensuring the smooth implementation of the cloud migration and localization transformation of workspace products

comments.name: Jennifer
comments.comment: With comprehensive technical capabilities, he is competent for all kinds of emergency development work, supports timely response to existing network problems in Cambodia and Russia, and performs outstandingly in tasks such as UIUE transformation of the entire product line, Flash expiration transformation, and server downgrade.

comments.name: Michael
comments.comment: Joined YTO as a fresh graduate recruited from campus. Familiar with the business and quickly got started. In the tight development cycle, I worked closely with other colleagues to complete the urgent delivery task.
